Switzerland, officially the Swiss Confederation, is a country situated at the confluence of Western, Central, and Southern Europe. It is a federal republic composed of 26 cantons, with federal authorities based in Bern.

In Europe, it consists of 12 provinces that border Germany to the east, Belgium to the south, and the North Sea to the northwest, with maritime borders in the North Sea with those countries and the United Kingdom.

Bouvet Island, located in the Subantarctic, is a dependency of the Kingdom of Norway.

Nepal (English: ; Nepali: à¤¨à¥‡à¤ªà¤¾à¤² [neËˆpal]), officially the Federal Democratic Republic of Nepal, is a sovereign country in South Asia. It is mainly in the Himalayas, but also includes parts of the Indo-Gangetic Plain.

New Zealand (MÄori: Aotearoa [aÉ”ËˆtÉ›aÉ¾É”a]) is an island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean. It consists of two main landmassesâ€”the North Island (Te Ika-a-MÄui) and the South Island (Te Waipounamu)â€”and around 600 smaller islands, covering a total area of 268,021 square kilometres (103,500 sq mi).

Oman ( (listen) oh-MAHN; Arabic: Ø¹ÙÙ…ÙØ§Ù†â€ Ê¿UmÄn [Ê•ÊŠËˆmaËn]), officially the Sultanate of Oman (Arabic: Ø³Ù„Ù’Ø·Ù†Ø©Ù Ø¹ÙÙ…Ø§Ù†â€ Salá¹­anat(u) Ê»UmÄn), is a country on the southeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula in Western Asia and the oldest independent state in the Arab world. Located in a strategically important position at the mouth of the Persian Gulf, the country shares land borders with the United Arab Emirates to the northwest, Saudi Arabia to the west, and Yemen to the southwest, and shares marine borders with Iran and Pakistan.
Pakistan, officially the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, is a country in South Asia. It is the world's fifth-most populous country with a population exceeding 212.2 million.

Panama ( (listen) PAN-É™-mah,  pan-É™-MAH; Spanish: PanamÃ¡ IPA: [panaËˆma] (listen)), officially the Republic of Panama (Spanish: RepÃºblica de PanamÃ¡), is a transcontinental country in Central America and South America, bordered by Costa Rica to the west, Colombia to the southeast, the Caribbean Sea to the north, and the Pacific Ocean to the south. The capital and largest city is Panama City, whose metropolitan area is home to nearly half the country's 4 million people.Panama was inhabited by indigenous tribes before Spanish colonists arrived in the 16th century.

Peru ( (listen); Spanish: PerÃº [peËˆÉ¾u]; Quechua: Piruw [pÉªÉ¾ÊŠw]; Aymara: Piruw [pÉªÉ¾ÊŠw]), officially the Republic of Peru (Spanish: RepÃºblica del PerÃº ), is a country in western South America. It is bordered in the north by Ecuador and Colombia, in the east by Brazil, in the southeast by Bolivia, in the south by Chile, and in the south and west by the Pacific Ocean.

The Philippines ( (listen); Filipino: Pilipinas [ËŒpÉªlÉªËˆpinÉs] or Filipinas [fÉªlÉªËˆpinÉs]), officially the Republic of the Philippines (Filipino: Republika ng Pilipinas), is an archipelagic country in Southeast Asia. Situated in the western Pacific Ocean, it consists of about 7,641 islands that are broadly categorized under three main geographical divisions from north to south: Luzon, Visayas, Mindanao.

Romania ( (listen) ro-MAY-nee-É™; Romanian: RomÃ¢nia [romÉ¨Ëˆni.a] (listen)) is a country located at the crossroads of Central, Eastern, and Southeastern Europe. It shares land borders with Bulgaria to the south, Ukraine to the north, Hungary to the west, Serbia to the southwest, and Moldova to the east and has its opening to the Black Sea.

Rwanda, officially the Republic of Rwanda, is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley where the African Great Lakes region and East Africa converge.  One of the smallest countries on the African mainland, its capital city is Kigali.

Saudi Arabia, officially the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, is a country in Western Asia constituting the vast majority of the Arabian Peninsula. With a land area of approximately 2,150,000 km2 (830,000 sq mi), Saudi Arabia is geographically the largest sovereign state in Western Asia, the second-largest in the Arab world (after Algeria), the fifth-largest in Asia, and the 12th-largest in the world.

The Sudan (; Arabic: Ø§Ù„Ø³ÙˆØ¯Ø§Ù†â€ as-SÅ«dÄn) or North Sudan, officially the Republic of the Sudan  (Arabic: Ø¬Ù…Ù‡ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø³ÙˆØ¯Ø§Ù†â€ JumhÅ«riyyat as-SÅ«dÄn), is a country in Northeast Africa. Senegal ( (listen); French: SÃ©nÃ©gal; Wolof: Senegaal; Arabic: Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù†ØºØ§Ù„ Alsinighal), officially the Republic of Senegal (French: RÃ©publique du SÃ©nÃ©gal; Wolof: RÃ©ewum Senegaal; Arabic: Ø¬Ù…Ù‡ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ© Ø§Ù„Ø³Ù†ØºØ§Ù„ Jumhuriat Alsinighal), is a country in West Africa. Sierra Leone ( (listen), also UK: , US: ), officially the Republic of Sierra Leone, informally Salone, is a country on the southwest coast of West Africa. It is bordered by Liberia to the southeast and Guinea to the northeast.

El Salvador ( (listen); Spanish: [el salÎ²aËˆÃ°oÉ¾] (listen)), officially the Republic of El Salvador (Spanish: RepÃºblica de El Salvador, literally "Republic of The Saviour"), is a country in Central America. It is bordered on the northeast by Honduras, on the northwest by Guatemala, and on the south by the Pacific Ocean.

Serbia (Serbian: Ğ¡Ñ€Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ˜Ğ°, romanized: Srbija, pronounced [sÅ™Ì©bija]), officially the Republic of Serbia (Serbian: Ğ ĞµĞ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ° Ğ¡Ñ€Ğ±Ğ¸Ñ˜Ğ°, romanized: Republika Srbija, pronounced [repÇ”blika sÅ™Ì©bija]), is a landlocked country situated at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe in the southern Pannonian Plain and the central Balkans. It borders Hungary to the north, Romania to the northeast, Bulgaria to the southeast, North Macedonia to the south, Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina to the west, and Montenegro to the southwest.

Suriname  (, US also , sometimes spelled Surinam), officially known as the Republic of Suriname (Dutch: Republiek Suriname [reËpyËŒblik syËriËˆnaËmÉ™]), is a country on the northeastern Atlantic coast of South America. It is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean to the north, French Guiana to the east, Guyana to the west and Brazil to the south.

Slovenia ( (listen) sloh-VEE-nee-É™; Slovene: Slovenija [slÉ”ËˆÊ‹Ã¨Ënija]), officially the Republic of Slovenia (Slovene: Republika Slovenija , abbr.: RS), is a country located in Central Europe at the crossroads of main European cultural and trade routes. 
It is bordered by Italy to the west, Austria to the north, Hungary to the northeast, Croatia to the southeast, and the Adriatic Sea to the southwest.

Sweden (; Swedish: Sverige [ËˆsvÃ¦ÌŒrjÉ›] (listen)), officially the Kingdom of Sweden (Swedish: Konungariket Sverige [ËˆkÃ´ËnÉµÅ‹aËŒriËkÉ›t ËˆsvÃ¦ÌŒrjÉ›] (listen)), is a Nordic country in Northern Europe. It borders Norway to the west and north, Finland to the east, and is connected to Denmark in the southwest by a bridge-tunnel across the Ã–resund Strait.

Chad ( (listen); Arabic: ØªØ´Ø§Ø¯â€ TishÄd, Arabic pronunciation: [tÊƒaËd]; French: Tchad, pronounced [tÊƒa(d)]), officially known as the Republic of Chad (Arabic: Ø¬Ù…Ù‡ÙˆØ±ÙŠØ© ØªÙ’Ø´ÙØ§Ø¯â€ JumhÅ«riyyat TÅ¡Äd; French: RÃ©publique du Tchad), is a landlocked country in north-central Africa. It is bordered by Libya to the north, Sudan to the east, the Central African Republic to the south, Cameroon to the south-west, Nigeria to the southwest (at Lake Chad), and Niger to the west.

Thailand, officially the Kingdom of Thailand and formerly known as Siam, is a country in Southeast Asia. Located at the centre of the Indochinese Peninsula, it is composed of 76 provinces, and covers an area of 513,120 square kilometres (198,120 sq mi), and a population of over 66 million people.

Tunisia, officially the Republic of Tunisia, is a country in the Maghreb region of North Africa, covering 163,610 square kilometres (63,170 square miles). Its northernmost point, Cape Angela, is also the northernmost point on the African continent.

Turkey (Turkish: TÃ¼rkiye [ËˆtyÉ¾cije]), officially the Republic of Turkey (Turkish: TÃ¼rkiye Cumhuriyeti [ËˆtyÉ¾cije dÊ’umËˆhuËÉ¾ijeti] (listen)), is a transcontinental country located mainly on the Anatolian Peninsula in Western Asia, with a smaller portion on the Balkan Peninsula in Southeastern Europe. Turkey is bordered on its northwest by Greece and Bulgaria; north by the Black Sea; northeast by Georgia; east by Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Iran; southeast by Iraq; south by Syria and the Mediterranean Sea; and west by the Aegean Sea.

Tanzania (, Swahili: [tanzaËˆni.a]), officially the United Republic of Tanzania (Swahili: Jamhuri ya Muungano wa Tanzania), is a country in East Africa within the African Great Lakes region. It borders Uganda to the north; Kenya to the northeast; Comoro Islands and the Indian Ocean to the east; Mozambique and Malawi to the south; Zambia to the southwest; and Rwanda, Burundi, and the Democratic Republic of the Congo to the west.

Uruguay ( (listen); Spanish: [uÉ¾uËˆÉ£waj] (listen)), officially the Oriental Republic of Uruguay (Spanish: RepÃºblica Oriental del Uruguay), is a country in the southeastern region of South America. It borders Argentina to its west and southwest and Brazil to its north and east, with the RÃ­o de la Plata (River of Silver) to the south and the Atlantic Ocean to the southeast.

The United States of America (USA), commonly known as the United States (U.S. or US) or America, is a country located primarily in North America, consisting of 50 states, a federal district, five major self-governing territories, and various possessions. At 3.8 million square miles (9.8 million square kilometers), it is the world's third- or fourth-largest country by total area.

Uzbekistan (UK: , US: ; Uzbek: OÊ»zbekiston, pronounced [ozbekiËˆstÉ’n]), officially the Republic of Uzbekistan (Uzbek: OÊ»zbekiston Respublikasi), is a country in Central Asia. It is one of two doubly landlocked countries as it is surrounded by Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan and Turkmenistan.

South Africa, officially the Republic of South Africa (RSA), is the southernmost country in Africa. With over 59 million people, it is the world's 24th-most populous nation and covers an area of 1,221,037 square kilometres (471,445 sq mi).
